speakers.name: Rodrigo Gomes da Silva
speakers.bio: Self-taught, JavaScript enthusiast and open source contributor, started alone to develop simple tools in VB, professionally started as full-stack developer using Grails framework, and currently operates with Rails and angular at ntxdev.

speakers.name: Gabriel Viégas
speakers.bio: Business Administrator, IT Project Management Specialist, CSPO(Certified Scrum Product Owner) and E-Commerce and Digital Marketing Student. Gabriel is 43 years old. He has been working for 15 years selling software solutions and 8 years as an IT project leader. Currently working as a Product Owner at Terra.

speakers.name: Roberto Fermann
speakers.bio: Advertising and marketing graduated and postgraduated in Business Management. Roberto has been working in the digital products industry for 10 years. Currently manages a products development team at Terra Networks.

speakers.name: Fabiano Franz
speakers.bio: Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat, working for over 4 years developing the OpenShift project, with an engineering team distributed across the world. Google Kubernetes Commiter. Developer and full-stack web developer for over 15 years. Fabiano has worked with languages like Java, Ruby and Go while working on research projects and working at the development of companies like Banco do Brasil, Dell, Siemens, Ministério da Educação and many others.

speakers.name: Ari Stopassola Junior
speakers.bio: Informatic Bachelor with emphasis in Systems Analysis. Ari got a master graduation in Software Engineering in Lisboa. 'Ad Hoc' Legal Expert skilled in IT, Zend Certified(PHP 5.3) Engineer and Zend Certified PHP Engineer(PHP 5.5), Zend Framework Certified Architect(ZFCA), Certified ScrumMaster by Scrum Alliance, Microsoft Certified Professional(MCP), web consultant and PHP evangelist.

speakers.name: Rodrigo Nascimento
speakers.bio: JavaScript developer since 2008, front-end and back-end, enthusiastic of new tecnologies mainly related with JavaScript. Working with Node.js, MongoDB, Meteor, etc, at the Rocket.Chat and Konecty startups.

speakers.name: Rafael Kellermann Streit
speakers.bio: Working with iOS for about 5 years on many different projects, currently at We Heart It, with 50 million users. Appreciates quality, attention to usability and fine details.

speakers.name: Anderson Aguiar
speakers.bio: Working as web developer since 2008, Anderson has experienced languages like PHP, Delphi and Java. Currently working at Arezzo&CO as a Front-End Engineer. Feeling in love with JS and process automation.

speakers.name: Adriano Bonfiglio
speakers.bio: Internet Systems Bachelor and a graduate degree in Project Management. Developer for more than seven years, mostly dedicated to WEB, mainly using Java. NodeJS fan, Rest, Cloud, Microservices and Agile enthusiast. Currently working as a developer in the Cloud Service Center at SAP.

speakers.name: Ben-hur Santos Ott
speakers.bio: Ben-hur Ott Santos, passionate about new technologies, worked as a programmer and systems architect in large customer projects. Focused on Microsoft and Mobile Hybrid technology, always seeking innovation and challenges in emerging technologies.

speakers.name: Nelson Dutra Junior
speakers.bio: Graduating in Computer Engineering from UFPel, Free Software enthusiast and volunteer in the Mozilla Community Brazil, acts as Full Stack Developer. Currently engaged with Firefox Student Ambassadors project.
